message: I propose a 90/10 split.  Let's start fair and see where we end up.
Alice, that's a bit greedy, don't you think? I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think a 70/30 split is more fair, considering the inflation affecting your side. Let's reach an agreement before things get worse.

Alice, this back and forth isn't helping either of us.  I'm proposing a straight 50/50 split. It's the fairest option and ensures we both benefit. Let's end this now before inflation eats away at my share further.
